alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 11:42AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with heavy rainfall will impact portions of central Columbia County through 1230 PM EDT... At 1139 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Five Points, or over Lake City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Interstate 10, Interstate 75, and the Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Visibility restrictions on Interstates 10 and 75 as well as U.S. Highway 90 will occur with visibility reduced to one quarter mile in rain and fog. Slow down and use caution in heavy rainfall.
